author: Moran Sharir
title: Legendary reporter Gay Talese explains why he finds Trump inspiring - U.S. News - Haaretz.com
text: skip - Maavaron script skip - pop Gay Talese poses for a portrait at his home in Midtown Manhattan, December 13, 2016. Natan Dvir Legendary reporter Gay Talese explains why he finds Trump inspiring Gay Talese stalked Frank Sinatra, joined a nudist colony and liaised with a voyeur as part of his journalistic pursuits; he explains why he shuns technology entirely and why he finds Trump inspiring. By
